00016 #ifndef testdriverH
00017 #define testdriverH
00018 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00019 #include "primarydriver.h"
00020 #include "dummydriver.h"
00021 
00022 class XScalarEntry;
00023 
00024 class XTestDriver : public XDummyDriver<XPrimaryDriver>
00025 {
00026     XNODE_OBJECT
00027 protected:
00028     XTestDriver(const char *name, bool runtime,
00029                 const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00030                 const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00031                 const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00032                 const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers);
00033 public:
00034     //! usually nothing to do
00035     virtual ~XTestDriver() {}
00036     //! show all forms belonging to driver
00037     virtual void showForms();
00038 protected:
00039     //! Start up your threads, connect GUI, and activate signals
00040     virtual void start();
00041     //! Shut down your threads, unconnect GUI, and deactivate signals
00042     //! this may be called even if driver has already stopped.
00043     virtual void stop();
00044   
00045     //! this is called when raw is written 
00046     //! unless dependency is broken
00047     //! convert raw to record
00048     virtual void analyzeRaw() throw (XRecordError&);
00049     //! this is called after analyze() or analyzeRaw()
00050     //! record is readLocked
00051     virtual void visualize();
00052 private:
00053     shared_ptr<XThread<XTestDriver> > m_thread;
00054     double m_x,m_y;
00055     const shared_ptr<XScalarEntry> m_entryX, m_entryY;
00056     void *execute(const atomic<bool> &);
00057   
00058 };
00059 
00060 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00061 #endif
